Who I Am

Hi, I’m Blayne. I am a self-motivated tech enthusaist who loves continuous learning and improving. I’ve been hacking away since I was 14, when I learned programming by accident when I read the PHP manual because I wanted to make my Amazon Associates website more dynamic.

Experiences

Enterprise Architect

2020 - Present
Solera, Westlake, TX (Aquired DealerSocket)
  • Established enterprise standards across seven product lines
  • Identified multiple microservices fit for reuse across products then evangelized and hardened those services to be enterpriseready
  • Helped design the company-wide data platform including data lake and data warehouse used for reporting across multiple independent products

Application Architect

2018 - 2020
DealerSocket, Irving, TX
  • Defined architecture patterns for implementing highly scalable microservices that decomposed the monolith
  • Focused on numerous cost-savings initiatives, from blank slate to production, resulting in savings of over $10k/mo
  • Modernized our tech stack through adoption of containers, serverless architecture patterns, and event-based messaging
  • Regularly facilitated knowledge sharing sessions on latest learnings and best practices
  • Relentlessly advocated for applying devops best practices throughout the business for the purpose of improving quality, cost, and efficiency of our processes

Principal Software Engineer

2015 - 2018
DealerSocket, Irving, TX
  • Designed and led a team to implement a highly-scalable big data analytics platform using Apache Kafka, AWS S3, Apache Spark, and AWS Redshift
  • Researched, introduced, and evolved monitoring stack involving Telegraf, InfluxDB, Grafana, and Kapacitor, allowing all engineers to make data-driven decisions
  • Lead a number of scrum teams with high predictability rate of delivery across a number of application areas
  • Played a key role in the early experimental phase of microservice design which helped us define the modern tech stack using Java, Spring Boot, Docker, AWS ECS

Senior Software Engineer

2012 - 2015
DealerSocket, Irving, TX
  • Overhauled product-wide testing platform to allow separation of unit and integration tests for more rapid feedback earlier in development cycle
